climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: INFANT NUTRITION: This reduced lactose*** formula is crafted to ease babies who experience fussiness, gas, and crying while encouraging immunity and brain and eye development
EASY TO PREPARE: Simple-to-follow directions on the back of the formula container help you prepare your little one’s baby bottle with the right water-to-formula powder ratio for their feeding needs
FIRST 12 MONTHS: Support development and nourish your baby from their first day to their first birthday
EARTH'S BEST: Explore our full line of baby nutrition to find more sensitive baby formulas, gentle formulas, plant-based formulas, and toddler formulas
32 OZ FORMULA CONTAINER: Includes one 32 oz container of Earth's Best Organic Sensitivity Baby Formula
body.description: Your little one's dietary needs are unique, so their formula should be too. Our formulas at Earth's Best Organic are available in a variety of options to fit dietary restrictions like lactose sensitivity, lactose intolerance, and sensitive stomachs, making it easy to choose the right formula for your baby's nourishment needs. Made with organic milk from grass and grain-fed cows§, Earth's Best Organic Sensitivity Infant Formula with Iron has lutein, prebiotics, and DHA and ARA to give your baby nutrients that support immunity, brain development, and eye development. Whether you're looking for a way to supplement breastfeeding or for a nutrient-rich replacement, Earth's Best Organic infant formulas are a wholesome way to nourish your baby throughout their first twelve months. ***95% less lactose as compared to standard milk-based formulas. §USDA organic regulations require cows have access to pasture where they eat grass and other organic feed

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choosing the Perfect Formula Breast feeding is the first choice for infant nutrition, but if and when you choose formula, even if to supplement, it is important to understand the options available. For babies who can't tolerate a milk based formula, there are options. Milk based Soy based Partially Hydrolyzed Protein for babies with fussiness and gas Gentle formula with easy to digest proteins, including partially hydrolyzed whey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive tummies
reviews.reviewText: This formula has been so great for my daughter. She has been using it for five months and I go through one container every two weeks. She has had no tummy issues since using this formula and prefers it over any other formula as far as the flavor goes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breast feed baby loved this
reviews.reviewText: I lost my supply for over a month and had a very hard time putting my newborn on formula. This formula was easy on my babies tummy who was only breastfeed and i felt good that it is organic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the formula my son can have

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the 5th formula we tried because the others hurt her belly and made it hard for her to poop. She's doing great on this one. Unfortunately, it has gone up $5 a can since last month. Unbelievable!!! 😢

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The baby drinks it
reviews.reviewText: We bought this product many times already the baby drinks it. The thing is when you switch back-and-forth between breast-feeding and formula. It’s a little hard to get into it but once they drink the formula then that’s what they want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works best for my baby!
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research before having my baby girl. She was being given a great formula from birth that was made in New Zealand. Everything was ok until a month in she developed a rash on her face and back. I thought it was a heat rash until the gas pains started. I started doing extensive research again and Earth's Best sensitive seemed like a great option. My baby has been using this formula now for a little over a month. Her rash is completely gone. She doesn't get gas as often if ever. She still has acid reflux which I forgot to mention, but I recently purchased some single grain organic cereal for her. I'm hoping that does the trick. Overall I am very pleased with this formula for my precious baby. I hope that I helped someone in their decision for choosing the right formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this formula
reviews.reviewText: When Similac had their ecoli breakout my baby consumed some of the cans. We were notified by Similac that they sent us the cans in the mail and we gave them to supplement nursing when I wasn't producing enough for him. We hadn't settled on a brand and I really wanted organic but Similac sent these cans and I didn't plan on doing formula so early. I didn't expect to have supply issues. But ultimately I was stressed and my body couldn't produce enough so I had to figure something out.One of my friends gave her son the original can but I was worried about my son's sensitivity because he was having many bowel issues after the Similac episode. His bowels still aren't normal. But this formula is so much better. He's growing great and he drinks this stuff down.I was looking into the German brands but was worried about supply issues with shipping from another country but I do think that's the best other than this stuff. This would be id guess the second best formula in the world. And that is good for me. I think we're all on the edge of our seats waiting to see if we can't get formula. But I noticed my stores have no formula. The only cans Ive seen in store is this brand in the red can and one other can of Similac nobody uses. But that worried me that all brands were gone except two and they were short on supply of those as well. The shelves have been bare for months. I've never seen anything like it. I'm an extreme couponer so I'm in store alot and Ive watched the supply issues with all products but formula shortage is scary because people will try to make their own formula and make their babies sick not meaning to. So please research what's best for your baby. This was our choice and I'm happy with my regular shipment every two weeks automatically two of these cans are at my doorstep. Love it! Thanks for a great product and reliability during crazy formula shortage. Since switching to Earth's best we haven't run out of formula at all. I feel confident that I will not get any notifications saying they are out of stock any time soon. Can't say that about the grocery store when the shelves of baby stuff is bare. I don't know if anyone else has this issue but we've been getting a lot of bad baby food from the grocery store and the shelves are empty days before but stocked up with bad product. This is ridiculous!
